评论详情: I was hesitant to buy this, because there were no ratings, and there was shipping charge.  But I am glad I ordered it because the style is cute, print is as pictured, well made, and the fabric isn't the best, but better than the closeup in the photo.  The fabric is 100% polyester, and washes and dries well.  Very comfortable.  One thing I didn't like was that they used white thread on the seams, which shows through somewhat on the black background.

评论概述: Happy Pants with a Beautiful Mermaid
评论详情: I bought these because they looked like a colourful painting. Also, because they looked comfortable. There are shades of pink, blue/turquoise, yellow, orange and more. You can wear a variety of styles in tops in a variety of colours. The mermaid design is incredible and beautiful. I the artistic, creative style of the mermaid design - like an artist painted them just for me. They are loose fitting for the HOT summer. The main reason I bought them was because they make me smile and feel happy.

These are really lovely crops, light and airy.  That said, they are definitely NOT cotton/linen.  They are rayon.  Nice in its own way, very pretty, but not the fabric I would have preferred.Please, change the description!!!!

评论概述: There is nothing cotten or linen in this material.
评论详情: Very disappointed with this product. The print on the pant look pixelated. They are not worth wearing in public but comfortable enough to lounge at home or sleep in. I was hoping to have something easy to wear and pack for summer vacation.

Loved the fit. I’m a size 2x and things don’t often fit properly. These were flattering and fit very nicely.  Only thing it didn’t have were labels for laundry. Can’t remember if they’re washable…?  Nice pockets, great quality. I bought 3 pairs of different designs. Will probably purchase more!

I love this print - it's beautiful. The fabric is unusual - reminds me of thin drapery fabric. It's soft and smooth but not at all stretchy. My only issue was sizing. I typically order XXL because I like my clothing loose. In this I sized up to 3X and it's still too snug. Wish I had ordered 4X.  Be sure to size up.

评论概述: Be sure to order larger sizes ! These do run small.
评论详情: I love the style and the fabric. The sizes run small so order at least two sizes up.
I love these pants! So often when I buy pants they are too long. These are the perfect length for me, and the colors are beautiful! They also wash very well.
Quality and color
The pants fit nicely, but changed my mind on them.

I’ve been waiting for a few weeks to get these and while they are a very cute print, I’m very disappointed in the construction of them. Verypoor sewing job, most of the back side and croch area has very loose stitching as seen in the photo. I would think that quality review would have caught this and seen this much better. I’m afraid to wear them as it looks like it would not take much to pull apart.
Super cute pants. I get a lot of complaints on them....BUT they are not cotton linen. 100% polyester. Very comfy though. Shipping took quite awhile.
I got so many compliments on these pants!  They travel well and worked great for a dressy night in Greece!

评论概述: Order next size up for comfort!
评论详情: Beautiful design! Very unique! Nice addition to wardrobe!
These pants are beautiful and very comfortable.  I love them!
Really like these pants! Get compliments every time I wear them!
These pants are not cotton or linen-100% polyester and also not soft.
These pants fit good.
I love these! They're lightweight and cute on. I'm a bit hippy and they still look good.
I am truly diappointed with the product. It's just 100% polyester and not what was promised in the product description. I did not read the reviews before I bought it ... my bad.
The fabric is very disappointing and doesn't feel nice to wear at all. Which is sad because it does look great aaaaand the colors are vibrant. But the feel isn't worth it. Too bad.
Not cotton. Not linen. Some cheap silky material. More like pyjama bottoms. Chinese scam. Don't do it

Do not order!  These pants are not made of cotton, they are some kind of synthetic material. What’s worse is that the return label I received is invalid and there does not appear to be a way to return these.
Not linen, as in the description. Washed in a bag and still had the seams come off after the first wash.
Comfortable cute style summer pants. Nice fabric  and the prints are very nice. They do shrink a little in length if wash and dry them.  Probably not if hang to dry.
